footer.description: Connecting people across Haryana with reliable and comfortable bus services.

about.title: About Haryana Roadways
about.subtitle: Connecting Haryana with Excellence
about.description: Haryana Roadways has been serving the people of Haryana for decades, providing reliable, comfortable, and affordable transportation services across the state and beyond.
about.missionText: To provide safe, reliable, and comfortable transportation services while maintaining the highest standards of customer satisfaction.
about.visionText: To be the leading public transportation service in Haryana, connecting communities and fostering economic growth.
about.safetyDesc: We prioritize the safety of our passengers above all else.
about.reliabilityDesc: On-time service you can count on.
about.comfortDesc: Modern buses with all amenities for a pleasant journey.

services.subtitle: Experience Premium Bus Services

services.luxuryBusesDesc: Travel in comfort with our premium AC buses
services.trackingDesc: Track your bus location in real-time
services.multipleRoutesDesc: Extensive network covering all major destinations
services.safeTravelingDesc: Your safety is our top priority

keyServices.title: Modern Fleet
keyServices.description: Travel in our latest fleet of Volvo and AC buses equipped with modern amenities.

keyServices.description: Stay connected on the go with our complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi service.

keyServices.description: Multiple payment options including UPI, Cards, and Net Banking.

keyServices.description: 24/7 GPS tracking and emergency support for a secure travel experience.
